data.details: Developing and deploying smart contracts with leading blockchain wallets. Utilizing advanced tools and libraries for Ethereum and other blockchain protocols. Creating intuitive user interfaces for displaying blockchain data. Gained extensive experience working on diverse projects, including Seed Platforms, Gaming Platforms, Swap Functionality, WarpCast Frame Creation, as well as handling splitting and multi-transactions.

Refactoring, maintaining, creating widgets and building data models and business logic. Writing code that is as simple as possible for understanding. Collaborating with a team of world-class engineers on cutting-edge technologies. Understanding and adhering to the principle of 'least astonishment' development.

Developing fast, modular web applications and contributing to documentation efforts. Utilizing frontend frameworks and libraries, such as React. Collaborating effectively with backend developers, project managers, and team members. Designing and optimizing web interfaces for diverse devices and screen sizes.

Translating design mockups and wireframes into functional web pages using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Optimizing for various screen sizes to enhance accessibility across devices and improving web performance.
Developed websites from scratch using HTML, CSS, PHP, and CMS platforms. Collaborated with hosting providers for server management and ensured up-to-date content and optimal loading date.
Created commercial proposals, sold contextual advertising within 2GIS products, and contributed to CMS-based website development.
Market research and trend analysis. Marketing and product promotion strategy development. Monitoring product performance metrics. Project planning and execution.
Prospected clients via the E-Commerce aggregator portal and cultivated business relationships through phone and in-person interactions. Studied SPIN techniques and popular content management systems.

education.title: Education
education.faculty: Faculty of Physics, Electronics, and Computer Systems
